basics.name: Jorge Luis
basics.label: Engineer, Product and Project Manager, Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I am a person who loves software technology, hardware, video games and everything related to computers. I have more than 15 years of experience in the IT field, I began to working in desktop application for accounting sector, then I moved to web development, development product and project management. Later, I worked in infrastructure, managing bare-metal servers in GNU/Linux and Windows environments, as well as in cloud computing, virtualization and containerization. I also have experience as a database administrator. I am  proficient in various programming languages, frameworks. I like to learn new technologies and enhance my skills. I am a responsible person, with good communication skills and ability to work in team.

work.name: Ideas en Binario
work.position: Product and Project Manager, Full Stack Developer

projects.name: Odoo Localization Contributor
projects.description: Fiscal localizations are country-specific modules that allow you to be compliant with a fiscal requirements. These modules are related to the Accounting, but they can also be necessary for other apps such as Inventory, eCommerce ...

projects.name: Odoo Localization Friendly Version
projects.description: This project is a fork of the original OCA repository, but with some modifications to make it easier to use and understand.

projects.name: uniCenta fork for Ecuador
projects.description: uniCenta oPOS powerful commercial-grade open source Point Of Sale, this project allows to be compliant with the fiscal requirements in Ecuador.

projects.name: RoQui Ec
projects.description: E-Invoice module that generates XML, Sign and Send to the SRI (Ecuadorian Tax Authority) for integration with any ERP or Point of Sale software.

projects.name: Echo Print
projects.description: REST API Server for print tickets in Printers (ESC/POS) from any device that can make HTTP requests. Is ideal for web applications and mobile applications.

projects.name: ReIdi
projects.description: REST API Microservice for return the information of a Ecuadorian National ID (Cédula) or a Tax ID (RUC). The information is obtained from the official public website of SRI (Ecuadorian Tax Authority).
